languages.text: Гигантские твари оказываются на удивление проворны — за считанные прыжки они настигают группу исследователей и впиваются мощными жвалами в тела несчастных, перемалывая их в кровавую кашу. Насытившись свежей плотью, гадины скрываются в колоссальных трещинах стен. Не имея сил и времени проститься с павшими товарищами, лишенные оборудования и надежды, остатки исследователей спешат убраться из проклятых пещер — обратно, на корабль, как можно скорее!

traits.locale_text: Гигантские твари оказываются на удивление проворны — за считанные прыжки они настигают группу исследователей и впиваются мощными жвалами в тела несчастных, перемалывая их в кровавую кашу. Насытившись свежей плотью, гадины скрываются в колоссальных трещинах стен. Не имея сил и времени проститься с павшими товарищами, лишенные оборудования и надежды, остатки исследователей спешат убраться из проклятых пещер — обратно, на корабль, как можно скорее!

languages.text: The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!
languages.original_text: Гигантские твари оказываются на удивление проворны — за считанные прыжки они настигают группу исследователей и впиваются мощными жвалами в тела несчастных, перемалывая их в кровавую кашу. Насытившись свежей плотью, гадины скрываются в колоссальных трещинах стен. Не имея сил и времени проститься с павшими товарищами, лишенные оборудования и надежды, остатки исследователей спешат убраться из проклятых пещер — обратно, на корабль, как можно скорее!

Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to say goodbye to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns — back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

languages.text: 这群巨大的怪物出乎意料地敏捷。它们几下就跳到了探险队员身边，有力的下颚刺穿了那些不幸之人的躯体，把他们碾成了血肉模糊的浆糊。那群怪物一边狼吞虎咽，一边钻进了巨大的墙壁裂缝里。探险队的幸存者失去了装备，也失去了希望。他们既没有时间，也没有精力向倒下的人做最后的告别，匆匆逃出了这个被诅咒的洞穴……回到船上，越快越好!
languages.original_text: The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

traits.locale_text: 这群巨大的怪物出乎意料地敏捷。它们几下就跳到了探险队员身边，有力的下颚刺穿了那些不幸之人的躯体，把他们碾成了血肉模糊的浆糊。那群怪物一边狼吞虎咽，一边钻进了巨大的墙壁裂缝里。探险队的幸存者失去了装备，也失去了希望。他们既没有时间，也没有精力向倒下的人做最后的告别，匆匆逃出了这个被诅咒的洞穴……回到船上，越快越好!

languages.text: 巨大な獣は驚くほど俊敏であることが分かった。ほんの数回のジャンプで探索チームに追いつき、強力な大あごで哀れな者たちの体を食い破り、血まみれのペースト状にした。新鮮な肉を貪り、怪物たちは壁の巨大な亀裂に逃げ込む。戦死者に最後の別れを告げる時間も体力もなく、装備も希望も奪われた探索チームの生き残りは、呪われた洞窟から飛び出した…できるだけ早く船に戻るんだ！
languages.original_text: The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

traits.locale_text: 巨大な獣は驚くほど俊敏であることが分かった。ほんの数回のジャンプで探索チームに追いつき、強力な大あごで哀れな者たちの体を食い破り、血まみれのペースト状にした。新鮮な肉を貪り、怪物たちは壁の巨大な亀裂に逃げ込む。戦死者に最後の別れを告げる時間も体力もなく、装備も希望も奪われた探索チームの生き残りは、呪われた洞窟から飛び出した…できるだけ早く船に戻るんだ！

languages.text: Las enormes bestias resultan ser sorprendentemente ágiles: en un par de saltos alcanzan al equipo de exploradores y penetran en sus cuerpos con poderosas mandíbulas, convirtiéndolos en una pasta sanguinolenta. Atiborrados de carne fresca, los monstruos se escabullen entre las colosales grietas de las paredes. Sin tiempo ni fuerzas para dar el último adiós a los caídos, desprovistos de equipo y esperanza, los restos de la expedición se apresuran a salir de las cavernas malditas... ¡A la nave, a toda prisa!
languages.original_text: The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

traits.locale_text: Las enormes bestias resultan ser sorprendentemente ágiles: en un par de saltos alcanzan al equipo de exploradores y penetran en sus cuerpos con poderosas mandíbulas, convirtiéndolos en una pasta sanguinolenta. Atiborrados de carne fresca, los monstruos se escabullen entre las colosales grietas de las paredes. Sin tiempo ni {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}fuerzas{/g} para dar el último adiós a los caídos, desprovistos de equipo y esperanza, los restos de la expedición se apresuran a salir de las cavernas malditas... ¡A la nave, a toda prisa!{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}

languages.text: Die riesigen Bestien sind erstaunlich behände. Mit ein paar wenigen Sprüngen erreichen sie das Erkundungsteam, schlagen ihre mächtigen Zähne in die Körper der unglückseligen Soldaten und verarbeiten sie zu einem blutigen Brei. Gesättigt vom frischen Fleisch huschen die Monster davon und verschwinden in den riesigen Rissen in den Wänden. Die Überreste der Expedition haben weder die Zeit noch die Kraft, den Gefallenen einen würdigen Abschied zu bereiten. Auch Ausrüstung und Hoffnung haben sie keine mehr, und so eilen sie aus den verfluchten Höhlen ... zurück aufs Schiff, so schnell wie möglich!
languages.original_text: The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

traits.locale_text: Die riesigen Bestien sind erstaunlich behände. Mit ein paar wenigen Sprüngen erreichen sie das Erkundungsteam, schlagen ihre mächtigen Zähne in die Körper der unglückseligen Soldaten und verarbeiten sie zu einem blutigen Brei. Die Überreste der Expedition haben weder die Zeit noch die Kraft, den Gefallenen einen würdigen Abschied zu bereiten. Auch Ausrüstung und Hoffnung haben sie keine mehr, und so eilen sie aus den verfluchten Höhlen ... zurück aufs Schiff, so schnell wie möglich!

languages.text: Les créatures colossales font preuve d'une agilité étonnante au vu de leur taille. En l'espace de quelques bonds, elles rattrapent les explorateurs et plantent leurs redoutables mandibules dans leurs infortunées victimes, les réduisant rapidement à l'état de bouillie sanguinolente. Une fois repus de chair fraîche, les monstres détalent dans les immenses fissures qui lézardent les parois. N'ayant ni le temps ni la force nécessaires pour adresser un dernier adieu à leurs défunts camarades, les rescapés privés d'équipement et accablés par le désespoir se précipitent hors des cavernes maudites... Il leur faut regagner le vaisseau le plus vite possible !
languages.original_text: The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!

Il leur faut regagner le vaisseau le plus vite possible !

languages.text: Devasa yaratıklar meğer şaşırtıcı derecede kıvrakmış. Sadece birkaç sıçramayla kâşif ekibine ulaşıp zavallıların vücutlarına güçlü çene kemiklerini saplayarak öğütüp macuna çeviriyorlar. Tıka basa taze et yiyen canavarlar aceleyle duvarlardaki dev çatlaklara kaçıyor. Ekipten geriye kalanların can veren yoldaşlarına son bir veda etmeye vakti ve gücü olmadığı gibi, ekipmanları ve umutları da kalmadığı için bu uğursuz mağaradan telaşla çıkıp hemen gemiye doğru yola koyuluyorlar!
languages.original_text: The massive beasts turn out to be surprisingly agile — in a couple of jumps they reach the team of explorers and dig into the poor souls' bodies with powerful mandibles, mashing them into a bloody paste. Gorged on fresh meat, the monsters scurry away into the colossal cracks in the walls. Having neither the time nor the strength to bid a final farewell to the fallen, deprived of equipment and hope, the remnants of the expedition rush out of the accursed caverns... back, to the ship, as soon as possible!
